cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.offloading.backend

Class OffloadableBackendImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
        • cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.offloading.backend.OffloadableBackendImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OffloadableBackend

    public abstract class OffloadableBackendImpl
extends org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
implements OffloadableBackend
    Offloadable backend implementation superclass. Each offloadable backend implementation must extend this class. It provides implementation of common methods.

    --------------------------- Created by Jakub Kinst 2015 E-mail: jakub@kinst.cz
